summary: A dictatorial film director (Peter Finch) hires an unknown actress (Kim Novak) to play the lead role in a planned movie biography of a late, great Hollywood star.
cast: Kim Novak|Peter Finch|Ernest Borgnine|Milton Selzer|Rossella Falk|Gabriele Tinti|Valentina Cortese|Jean Carroll|Michael Murphy|Coral Browne|Lee Meriwether|James Lanphier|Robert Ellenstein|Nick Dennis|Dave Willock|Peter Bravos|Ellen Corby|Michael Fox|Hal Maguire|Tom Patty|Vernon Scott|Queenie Smith|Sidney Skolsky|Barbara Ann Warkmeister|Mel Warkmeister|William Aldrich|John Alvin|Don Ames|Ernest Anderson|Al Bain|Al Beaudine|William Beckley|Doug Bell|Jack Berle|Danny Borzage|Bella Bruck|Christine Burke|Noble 'Kid' Chissell|Gene Chronopoulos|Robert Cornthwaite|Billy Curtis|Corinne Daniels|Tony Dante|Ted Dudomaine|Duke Fishman|Fritz Ford|Alan Foster|John Francis|Walter Friedel|Bill Giorgio|George Golden|Jack Gordon|William Graeff Jr.|Joe Gray|Robert Hitchcock|Rex Holman|John Indrisano|Kenner G. Kemp|George Kennedy|Michael King|Robert Lussier|Monte Mansfield|Walter Maslow|Dick McAuliffe|James McEachin|Dick Miller|Philip Mitchell|Hans Moebus|Michele Montau|Monty O'Grady|Tom Palmer|Alain Patrick|Jan Peters|Joe Ploski|Kirk Raymond|Tony Regan|Cosmo Sardo|Bernard Sell|Robert 'Buddy' Shaw|Hal Taggart|Peter Virgo Jr.|Ralph Volkie|Max Wagner|Victoria Zinny
title: La leyenda de Lylah Clare
